data.name: cmdAdClient.Text
data.value: Click Here To Get Your Google Adsense ID

data.name: AdClient.Message
data.value: You must click Update to save your Adsense ID. You must also check your email for a message from Google Adsense, asking you to verify your account information and submit your application for approval. Once your Adsense ID is saved and your account is approved, you can enable contextual advertising on your site by adding the Google Adsense Module to any Page. Please note that Public Service Ads may be displayed initially while Google indexes your site for content.

data.name: valAdClient.Message
data.value: You must enter your Google Adsense ID.

data.name: plChannel.Help
data.value: Optionally enter your Channel ID from Google ( Channels must first be set up on the Google website )

data.name: plBorder.Help
data.value: Optionally select a color for the Border or enter a Color Hex code

data.name: plTitle.Help
data.value: Optionally select a color for the Title or enter a Color Hex code

data.name: plBackground.Help
data.value: Optionally select a color for the Background or enter a Color Hex code

data.name: plText.Help
data.value: Optionally select a color for the Text or enter a Color Hex code

data.name: plURL.Help
data.value: Optionally select a color for the URL or enter a Color Hex code

data.name: Script.Text
data.value:
<script type="text/javascript"><!--
google_ad_client = "[ADCLIENT]";[HOST]
google_ad_width = [WIDTH];
google_ad_height = [HEIGHT];
google_ad_format = "[FORMAT]";
google_ad_type = "text";
google_ad_channel = "[CHANNEL]";
google_color_border = "[BORDER]";
google_color_bg = "[BACKGROUND]";
google_color_link = "[TITLE]";
google_color_text = "[TEXT]";
google_color_url = "[URL]";
//--></script>
<script type="text/javascript"
  src="http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/show_ads.js">
</script>
